list_definition.definition: to move in time to music by ma-king a series of rhythmic steps
to move quickly up and down

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The father was dancing the baby on his knee.

list_definition.definition: a series of fixed steps made in time to music

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Have you done this dance before?

list_definition.definition: a social gathering at which people dance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We’re going to a dance next Saturday.
